titles.title: A bill to provide for the transfer of certain real property at the Alvin C. York Veterans' Administration Medical Center in Rutherford County, Tennessee, to the State of Tennessee, for use as a State Veterans nursing care facility.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 9/14/1988--Introduced. Directs the Administrator of Veterans Affairs to transfer specified lands of the Alvin C. York Veterans' Administration Medical Center to the State of Tennessee for use solely as a State veterans nursing care facility.
